revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54AG |revision=v1 |upc=745883559480 |fcc_date=03/05/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX5514 |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT54AG,OSZ39000M |pcb_id=109-700-9100 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed=175 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F320J3A-110 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Dynachips |ram1_model=D98SD12816AH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 9-pad header,, DB-9,, |wi1_module=Gemtek WL-535AG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3890;ISL3890IK; |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3690 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325A2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Wireless A/G Broadband Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54AG|pid=01t80000003KWKkAAO}}
"109-700-9100" and "WX5514_V04" is silkscreened on the main board of a production unit. :The board shown in the FCC photos has two Mini PCI slots, but the un-used slot seems to be omitted on (at least some) production models. Likewise, the UART circuitry is omitted, though it is also omitted in the FCC docs. "WL535AG" and "109-501-5200" seems to be soldered on the wireless module on a production unit. :The U.FL connectors also seem to be omitted on the wireless module, opting for direct soldering to the card.
OEM: [[Gemtek]] WX-5514, same Gemtek part as the [[Linksys WRT51AB]]. :The default SSID may be '''default'''. The FCC manual states it is '''linksys'''.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''Linksys''' MS15-050250-A1D (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC, 2.5A).
This device may use U-NII-2 channels but does not implement DFS since it predates the FCC requirements.
==Forum threads== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?301-Asus-WL-500a-Yes!&p=2449#post2449 ''Linksys WRT54AG'' on '''wl500g''' forums] ([http://web.archive.org/web/20060222014538/http://members.chello.nl/~m.kuystermans/LinksysWRT54AG.jpg PCB image]) :RAM: ''ProMOS'' V54C3128164VAT6 (16MB) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r11588261-WRT54AG-not-WRT55AG-does-not-support-WPA-WPA2 ''Linksys WRT54AG'' on '''DSLReports''' forums] :[[Linksys WRT55AG v1]] - [[Broadcom]] B/G + [[Atheros]] A
==Additional external links== *[http://www.anderson-net.com/~nathan/wrt54ag/ Hacking the Linksys WRT54AG]
